Blog.post: hey wassap....itz been a long long tym i didnt update ma blog...guezz im pretti bz dese daes....heheh....niwae nw im home alone n bored without ma babyboi by ma side....haish...he'z werkin todae....so i'll jus chill at hm fer nw till i get kolz frm him to mit up....weEee!~ heheh....no one'z at hm...ma mum n dad went to msia....gone fer shoppin or wadeva...ma sis went out wit her boi...ma lil sis went to ma auntz hse.....left me alone....actuali i'm expectin a kol frm buggy...but he haven't....noty noty....hehekz.....haish...dunoe wad tah' do...jaz chattin n listenin to music...tatz all....wahaha....n tmr skoolin....shit!! haven finished ma art....gotta hand in tmr....ehekz...left to kaler ony...hope can get it done on tyme...fuuH~ wakakak.....jus hopin' tmr gonna be a gr8 dae fer me....n i wished de t'cher wud xcuse me fer not turnin up on de rehearsal dae.....jus hopin' n wishin' she understandz ma situation....hehe...n i wud gif her tat pathetic pity look wud be fyne....ahakz...notty bitchy me.....i relie2 wanna quit it man....arghh! kla peepz...wanna rest...n watch teevee.....will update any latest info tmr aitez.....peace~

haish....im feelin soo damn tired n slippy....went to de stoopit useless outing n went bk at ard 5....frm 2 all de way till 5...can u imagine it...den do sum CIP hrz sumore lyk wiping de chairs n tables....gosh....soo tiring....den afta tat mit buggy sumwhere near de place....waited fer him quite long but not as long as he alweys waited fer me...he came all de way frm skool afta playin soccer wit hiz fwenz...rushin...jaz to mit me...isnt tat soo swit of him...hehesh...hehee...u noe im beri late at dressin up and all tat...n so i alweys turn up late...ekeke...i noe itz beri mean fer me to do tat to him...but nw im not gonna repeat ma dumb mean inconsiderate mistakes animore...ehehe....frm nw on im gonna be punctual at all tymez (hope so)...hahah....n yar i was late fer skool jaz nw...soo shitty!! den kena punish...haish...rabakz....but actuali i haf a gud reason fer cumin to skool late u noe...i overslept....n aniwae it was rainin catz n dogz....wakakaka....so its not ma fault...de bus driver drove soo slow as it was rainin heavily...i told yeo abt it but he didnt belif...argh..heck care larh...i waz not de only one late wad....mannie othaz...so juz chill laa...ehehe...i had mathz...n it waz horrible...i hardly understand de topicz we learnt jaz nw....soo tough...hahah....neva paid attention cos i had a headache n cant concentrate so i jaz kinda slip awhile...canot long2 laa...if not get scolding frm de t'cher...lagi malu....ahakz....ermm....tink datz all i can write fer todae....soo freakin slippy oredy....wil kip u updated abt stuff goin on....fer nw i wanna bobok aitez...ekeke...kayz nyte2 ppl....shWitDreaMz!~

yst waz great...we had fun...celebratin ma mum'z bdae...at east coast... we ate alot...n it waz hell of a tyme...everione waz havin de tyme of their lifez...ekeke... but pity...i didnt haf tyme to buy ma mom a present...hehesh...but nvm...all de love i haf fer her n makin her hapee by studyin hard iz wad she alweys wan...so i wud try to prove to her tat i can make it!! Niwae we went dere lyk 730pm...n reached hm ard 11pluz....it was soo damn tiring...coz de nex dae muz wake up earli fer skool....wich i hate....argh! ahahkz....kla ppl...i wanna slip oredie...(mata da kuyu ar)....ekeke....nytez evryone...switDreamz~

im soo slippy...woke up 8++ in de mornin...jaz bcoz of ma sis...haish.... n nw itz aredie 12.45...wanna slip agen but cant...dunoe y....hahah...niwae buggy'z werkin todae.... wanna hangout layta....n yeah haven even done ma hmwerk....tmr mondae...hate skewlin... so damn farken bowin...SUX man....wen it cumz to mathz lesson...i didnt even pay attention to wad de t'cher is xplainin bout... slept moz thru it...heheh...i lyk to slack alot...hehesh...ohh yar on wed we're goin to wdldz evangelical church fer de racial harmony tingy....nid to do sum CIP hrz....gosh...i hate it man....didnt even wanna go in de ferst place but waz foced to...its compulsory...n itz nt fair sia...ony de sec2 klasses goin...de rest nid not to...shitty ryte?! hahakz....hmm soo long neva hangout wit ma all tyme fav fwen Syahza....don haf tym to...guezz im pretti bz wit stuff dese daez....but wanna chill2 wit her sumdae...still rememba dose glory daez wen we r lyk soo damn hyperactif...go here n dere...chill2 all tat...nw not de same...but sumtymz we mit up...shez much more kewler now...wit her hiphop crew n all...u go gurl! hapee fer ya....hahahkz...Mish ma baby Buggy...niD him...coz im dyin of boredom herre...ahakz!~ okiee laa b4 i blabber too much...betta i go watch teevee fer nw....hehehe...kayz peace ya'll~

hmm....jaz made ma new blog...wakaka...i noe itz uglie rite....hahahaa niwae...im feelin' so damn bored todae...wanna go out budden ma fwenz r all bz wit stuff... n buggy'z werkin todae...so guezz i'll jaz chill @ hm...ugh....dunnoe wad to do sia.... maeb i wil be hangin out tmr aft mitin buggy frm werk....ermm.....den goin' to follo him buy sum tingyz..... kla tatz all fer now....im soo freakin tired....dunnoe y.....wanna go slip ar....cya peepz....peace~

hey..itz been soo long i didnt update ma blog..haha...coz im bz all along...tatz y... soo sorie peepz...niwae im feelin beri hapee todae...i jaz cant figure out y...itz jaz im so so hapee...n bcoz todae iz ma 6mthz anniversary wit buggy.....lurve him soo soo much...been thru alot wit him...even in difficult n hard tymez....we managed to get along well...hehehekz! And yeah im grateful fer it...hmm...tmr skoolin....hahakx....but it be a gr8 dae fer me....ehehehe...;) Klah peepz....tatz all fer now....dunoe wad else to write abt....tatz it...i'll be online tmr i guess...to update abt latest happeningz...hahaha...Peace ya'll!~ cHalo~
